name: Buggotchi
description:
This Game was made for the NOKIA 3310 JAM 5
In this Game, you need to Raise your own Frog, from Egg to Frog, feed them, watch them grow and play with them in a Minigame.

The Bigger the Frog becomes, as hungrier it gets.

Try to beat your personal highscore.

This game is also Open Source

Controls:

C /  Space / Enter / Numpad 7 - Ok
X / Escape / Numpad 9 - Back
Arrow Keys / Numpad 4,6 - Menu Navigation
Space / Numpad 8 - Jump
Delete - Delete Save (hold the delete key in the menu)

Credits:

Sounds: Soundpack from Trix
Font: Nokiafc22
Engine: Godot Engine

This game was inspired by Tamagotchi and the Chrome Dino game.
